title: With this new Ascenscion Gamemode released, my client is bugging out!
body:
Yo,

Ever since I played the ascenscion gamemode, my client has been bugging out, it's not my ping, I get a steady 20-40. 

In Champ select, my Lobby chat wasn't working, and my chat kept reconnecting. My queue failed and I almost got a leaverbuster.


PLEASE HELP!!!!

replies.body:
You almost got a leaver-buster. I waited 40 minute queue for an ascension game to get a screen where I couldn't click any champions and had to wait another 15 minutes just to get back into queue :/ 

Well now game play is  a lot better than afternoon I do have to admit.  Whatever Riot is doing, keep up the good work <:

They're looking into the champ select issues, but yeah. Lot of issues going on at the moment with the client disconnecting, lobbies misbehaving and queues not starting correctly. It's not because you played Ascension, but it's likely because Ascension has been implemented. I recommend coming back to it tomorrow, hopefully things will be running smoother then.
